title: Did Kamala Harris have an out-of-nuptial exhibition with Willie Brown that promoted her career?
subtitle: Harris, a long time ago, kept herself out of the relationship.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Kemala Harris, Vice-President, had an extramarital relationship with the former Mayor of San Francisco and Head of the Council of State, Willie Brown, who gave her two political appointments starting her political life.
